author: joerg
msg: Added attribute modification methods: add, replace, modify, append.
LDAPTransformer now handles multiple attribute values.
The filter element is also configurable via a sitemap parameter.

author: bruno
msg: Cleaned up the situation with regards to the "uri" argument to
the sendPage, sendPageAndWait, and processPipelineTo functions.
URI's starting with a slash are resolved against the root sitemap,
URI's not starting with a slash are resolved against the current sitemap.

author: bruno
msg: As discussed some time ago on the dev list, log an error instead of
a warning when encountering the old I18N namespace, to give more

author: bruno
msg: Fixed bug 19841: untranslated-text doesn't work for i18n:text
